channel.title: Eric Thayer Design and Development on Eric Thayer is a Web Designer and Front-end Developer from Denver Colorado

item.title: questions
item.description: Below are some answers to frequently asked hiring questions and a description of what my dream job would be. Where are you currently working? "I'm currently working as a UI/UX designer and front-end developer at Health Scholars." Are you looking for in a new opportunity? "I want the chance to contribute and grow a product or brand with the collaboration of a senior design team. My goal is to be part of a team that values communication over deliverables.
